text: mi’imenaninina mi’iminatini besitefitochachewi፣ bek’enyochachewimi birihanachewi yemirot’i sihoni bemitayachewi k’eni (minida alilachewi)፡፡ zare bisiratachihu bewisit’ochachewi zewitariwochi sitihonu kesirochachewi wenizochi yemifesisubachewi genetochi nachewi (yibalalu)፡፡ yihi irisu talak’u ‘idili newi፡፡
